layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  RenderView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x101
  RenderBlock {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x100.67
    RenderBody {BODY} at (8,18.89) size 784x62.89
      RenderBlock {P} at (0,0) size 784x22
        RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 332x22
          text run at (0,0) width 332: "This text should be rendered with a first font."
      RenderBlock {P} at (0,40.89) size 784x22
        RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 353x22
          text run at (0,0) width 353: "This text should be rendered with a second font."
